DOC.brief_summary: This observational study investigate effect epimacular membrane peeling structure function retina .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Epimacular Gliosis Must schedule ILMpeeling independently study Must old 18 year age Visual acuity > 0,4 logMAR ( < 20/50 EDTRS ) Other ophthalmological disorder affect visual acuity and/or visual field and/or retinal structure
